msbt.message: No matter how long I stare, I just never get bored of bugs. Maybe that makes me weird. Whatever.I mean, I don't like it when they're leaping at my face or anything, but in a museum? Super fascinating.
This room's got a some really dangerous bugs in it. I just HAD to check 'em out, !I've been going from bug to bug, staring them all down. Don't wanna show any weakness!
I'm glad these bugs are so small. If they were any biggerwell, I wouldn't be cool with that.

Bugs have a ton of patience. They can just sit there for hours, waiting for their moment, .There's so much I can learn. They're so calm, so focused. I definitely need more of that in my life.Hmm I suppose they could also just be lazy though. I've already learned how to be lazy.
The temperature control in here's working a little TOO wellI feel like I'm gonna doze off, .Do you think bugs in warm places are always fighting to stay awake? Think they drink, like, bug coffee?
The insects in here are always a big hit with kids. I totally get it though.When I was a brat, I couldn't get enough of these bugs. Honestly, I'm still fascinated by 'em now!
If I see a bug flapping around, I get an urge to grab my net. It's probably a conditioned-reflex thingie.If I tried to catch any of the bugs in here, the curator'd probably get super angry,

This temperature feels absolutely perfect. I bet it's not just the bugs that are happy to be here.Look around. All the plants look soooo healthy, !I wish I had enough room for a greenhouse like this. It'd be a blast to look after so much greenery!

I love this room. It's so toasty and cozy. You can relax, take it easy, and just stare at some insects.Even the bugs look super relaxed though that might be because there aren't any predators in here.
This museum's really something, isn't it, ?Every time they get a new bug in, my hype ratchets up, like, three notches!
I love our little museum botanical garden thing. It makes our island feel socosmopolitan!
The bugs here are super lively! It really helps our museum stand out, don'tcha think?
This island's got so many cool bugsIt's a good thing we've got the museum to show 'em off in now!The bug display already rocks, but it'll be rockin' extra hard once we fill it up, !
I'm so glad the museum's finally open. Now we've got a place to show off 's bugs!I bet those bugs are gonna teach us a TON of awesome bug stuff. I can't wait, !
Our museum's bug display is already looking pretty rad, .I'm SO hyped for all the cool crawly critters we're gonna get in there!
